author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...SONIA REMAINS A TROPICAL STORM, EXPECTED TO WEAKEN INTO A REMNANT LOW LATER TONIGHT...
summary: ...SONIA REMAINS A TROPICAL STORM, EXPECTED TO WEAKEN INTO A REMNANT LOW LATER TONIGHT... As of 8:00 PM PDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Sonia was located near 15.4, -125.3 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...SONIA REMAINS A TROPICAL STORM, EXPECTED TO WEAKEN INTO A REMNANT LOW LATER TONIGHT... As of 8:00 PM PDT Tue Oct 28 the center of Sonia was located near 15.4, -125.3 with movement W at 12 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1005 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 40 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Storm Sonia (EP3/EP182025)
